violations_detected.title: Echo method not used
violations_detected.evidence: Customer provides name 'Алексей' at 00:05.767-00:06.587. Agent uses name in subsequent conversation but never repeats back 'Ваше имя Алексей, правильно?' or asks for confirmation. Contact data collected without echo method verification.

coaching_priorities.issue: Echo method not used for contact data
coaching_priorities.recommendation: When collecting customer name, repeat it back and ask for explicit confirmation: 'Ваше имя Алексей, правильно?' Wait for customer confirmation 'Да' or 'Верно' before proceeding.

1.1.evidence: No profanity or harsh language detected. Professional tone throughout call.

2.1.evidence: Agent does not disconnect prematurely or refuse service. Call handled professionally to completion.

3.1.evidence: Customer's request fully resolved: knows tire location (2 warehouse options), timing (tomorrow 10 AM), price (4110 rubles), and specifications.

3.3.evidence: No confidential information disclosed. No office numbers, internal codes, or unauthorized data sharing detected.

3.6.evidence: Agent announces search ('Сейчас, смотри минуту') before providing tire information, indicating database verification rather than memory-based response.

4.1.evidence: Customer is cooperative and professional. No indicators of difficult customer handling required. Text-based assessment only.
4.1.note: Full tone analysis would require audio

5.1.evidence: All required information provided: tire specs (185/65/14), model (Sony Quintor X-Pro), price (4110 rubles), warehouse locations, and delivery timing (tomorrow 10 AM).

6.1.evidence: Search duration 16 seconds (well under 40s threshold). Customer did not hang up.

7.1.evidence: Proper greeting with company name ('74 колеса'), operator name (Aleksandr), and offer to help. Professional closing ('Всего доброго'). Logical question sequence maintained.

7.2.evidence: Name 'Алексей' collected at 00:05.767-00:06.587 without echo confirmation. Agent uses name but never repeats back or asks 'Правильно?'

7.3.evidence: Intro at 0:00.447 (well within 5s from call start). Disconnect immediate after final speech.

7.4.evidence: No instances of operator cutting off customer mid-sentence without apology.

9.1.evidence: Search announced at 0:52.087, answer delivery begins at 1:08.318. Duration: 16.231 seconds (well under 40s threshold).

9.3.evidence: Agent thanks customer for waiting: 'Благодарю вас за ожидание' at 1:08.318, immediately after search completion.

10.2.evidence: Information provided per professional script. Logical flow from greeting to inquiry to product verification to search to information delivery.

10.3.evidence: Uses customer name 'Алексей' consistently. Professional rapport maintained throughout. Conversation control evident in systematic question sequence.

10.6.evidence: All required tire shop information provided accurately: specifications, pricing, availability, warehouse locations, delivery timeline.
10.6.note: Partial assessment without complete project configuration

positive_observations: Professional greeting with company name, operator identification, and customer orientation
Clear echo method attempted for product specifications ('185, 65, 14, правильно?') with customer confirmation
Efficient information search (16 seconds) within acceptable timeframe
Thanked customer for waiting after search completion
Provided comprehensive information: pricing, availability status, multiple warehouse options, delivery timing
Professional closing with standard farewell ('Всего доброго')
Consistent use of customer name throughout conversation
Calm and professional response to technical issues (customer asking 'Что?' - repeated information clearly)

data_quality.confidence_notes: Word-level JSON precision enabled high-confidence detection of echo method violation. VTT timing data confirmed search duration and greeting/closing compliance.
